MARK 14.63 iþ sa auhumista gudja disskreitands wastjos seinos qaþ:
ƕa þanamais þaurbum weis weitwode?
MARK 14.64 hausideduþ þo wajamerein is:
ƕa izwis þugkeiþ?
þaruh eis allai gadomidedun ina skulan wisan dauþau.
MARK 14.65 jah dugunnun sumai speiwan ana wlit is jah huljan andwairþi is jah kaupatjan ina;
jah qeþun du imma:
praufetei!
jah andbahtos lofam slohun ina.
MARK 14.66 jah wisandin Paitrau in rohsnai dalaþa atiddja aina þiujo þis auhumistins gudjins, MARK 14.67 jah gasaiƕandei Paitru warmjandan sik, insaiƕandei du imma qaþ:
jah þu miþ Iesua þamma Nazoreinau wast.
MARK 14.68 iþ is afaiaik qiþands:
ni wait, ni kann ƕa þu qiþis.
jah galaiþ faur gard, jah hana wopida.
MARK 14.69 jah þiwi gasaiƕandei ina aftra dugann qiþan þaim faurastandandam, þatei sa þizei ist.
MARK 14.70 iþ is aftra laugnida.
jah afar leitil aftra þai atstandandans qeþun du Paitrau:
bi sunjai, þizei is;
jah auk Galeilaius is jah razda þeina galeika ist.
MARK 14.71 iþ is dugann afaikan jah swaran þatei
ni kann þana mannan þanei qiþiþ.
MARK 14.72 jah anþaramma sinþa hana wopida.
jah gamunda Paitrus þata waurd, swe qaþ imma Iesus, þatei
faurþize hana hrukjai twaim sinþam, inwidis mik þrim sinþam.
jah dugann greitan.
MARK 15.1 Jah sunsaiw in maurgin garuni taujandans þai auhumistans gudjans miþ þaim sinistam jah bokarjam, jah alla so gafaurds gabindandans Iesu brahtedun ina at Peilatau.
MARK 15.2 jah frah ina Peilatus:
þu is þiudans Iudaie?
iþ is andhafjands qaþ du imma:
þu qiþis.
MARK 15.3 jah wrohidedun ina þai auhumistans gudjans filu.
MARK 15.4 iþ Peilatus aftra frah ina qiþands:
niu andhafjis ni waiht?
sai, ƕan filu ana þuk weitwodjand.
MARK 15.5 iþ Iesus þanamais waiht ni andhof, swaswe sildaleikida Peilatus.
MARK 15.6 iþ and dulþ ƕarjoh fralailot im ainana bandjan þanei bedun.
MARK 15.7 wasuh þan sa haitana Barabbas miþ þaim miþ imma drobjandam gabundans, þaiei in auhjodau maurþr gatawidedun.
MARK 15.8 jah usgaggandei alla managei dugunnun bidjan, swaswe sinteino tawida im.
MARK 15.9 iþ Peilatus andhof im qiþands:
wileidu fraleitan izwis þana þiudan Iudaie?
MARK 15.10 wissa auk þatei in neiþis atgebun ina þai auhumistans gudjans.
MARK 15.11 iþ þai auhumistans gudjans inwagidedun þo managein ei mais Barabban fralailoti im.
MARK 15.12 iþ Peilatus aftra andhafjands qaþ du im:
ƕa nu wileiþ ei taujau þammei qiþiþ þiudan Iudaie?
MARK 15.13 iþ eis aftra hropidedun:
ushramei ina.
MARK 15.14 iþ Peilatus qaþ du im:
ƕa allis ubilis gatawida?
iþ eis mais hropidedun:
ushramei ina.
MARK 15.15 iþ Peilatus wiljands þizai managein fullafahjan, fralailot im þana Barabban, iþ Iesu atgaf usbliggwands, ei ushramiþs wesi.

MARK 15.16 iþ gadrauhteis gatauhun ina innana gardis, þatei ist praitoriaun, jah gahaihaitun alla hansa MARK 15.17 jah gawasidedun ina paurpurai jah atlagidedun ana ina þaurneina wipja uswindandans MARK 15.18 jah dugunnun goljan ina:
hails, þiudan Iudaie!
MARK 15.19 jah slohun is haubiþ rausa jah bispiwun ina jah lagjandans kniwa inwitun ina.
MARK 15.20 jah biþe bilailaikun ina andwasidedun ina þizai paurpurai jah gawasidedun ina wastjom swesaim.
jah ustauhun ina ei ushramidedeina ina.
MARK 15.21 jah undgripun sumana manne, Seimona Kwreinaiu, qimandan af akra, attan Alaiksandraus jah Rufaus, ei nemi galgan is.
MARK 15.22 jah attauhun ina ana Gaulgauþa staþ, þatei ist gaskeiriþ ƕairneins staþs.
MARK 15.23 jah gebun imma drigkan wein miþ smwrna;
iþ is ni nam.
MARK 15.24 jah ushramjandans ina disdailjand wastjos is wairpandans hlauta ana þos, ƕarjizuh ƕa nemi.
